thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 5 de 501
thread.title: Mr Raymond Lavall
thread.title_full: DoYouSpain.com evaluado por Mr Raymond Lavall

author: Mr Raymond Lavall
title: Mr Raymond Lavall
text: I have used this company twice in the last three months and cannot fault them at present. Their prices compare very well to most other car hire company's in this region (Nerja) and their all inclusive insurance is much lower than that Quote: d by the major car hire company's without compromise to cover. On both previous occasions I have recieved a free upgrade in vehicle which was unexpected but most welcome!
